article.headline: Trump comment about slowing coronavirus testing was 'in jest,' White House press secretary says
article.body: President Donald Trump's Saturday comment about slowing testing for the coronavirus was made "in jest," White House press secretary Kayleigh McEnany said Monday. At the Tulsa rally on Saturday, Trump told supporters that widespread testing leads to logging more cases, and said, “So I said to my people, ‘Slow the testing down, please.’ They test and they test.” McEnany said Trump was criticizing the media's reporting about testing, and that he was not joking about the virus.
